name: static_patient_data
title: Static attributes of ICU patients extracted from MIMIC-III
description: Includes demographics and info about hospital/ICU admissions
license: The use of data is conditional on citing the original data sources.

fields.name: subject_id
fields.description: ID number for subject within PATIENTS table

fields.name: hadm_id
fields.description: ID number for subject within ADMISSIONS table

fields.name: icustay_id
fields.description: ID number for subject within ICUSTAYS table

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Indicates subject gender. 'M'=male or 'F'=female.

fields.name: ethnicity
fields.description: Indicates subject ethnicity. Many human-readable categories/sub-categories.

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age of patient at admission (in fractional years)

fields.name: insurance
fields.description: Insurance type of patient at admission.

fields.name: admittime
fields.description: Datetime of subject's admission.

fields.name: diagnosis_at_admission
fields.description: The admitting physician's diagnosis for this patient (why were they admitted).

fields.name: dischtime
fields.description: Datetime of subject's discharge.

fields.name: discharge_location
fields.description: To where the patient was discharged.

fields.name: fullcode_first
fields.description: Did the patient arrive with full code status?

fields.name: dnr_first
fields.description: Did the patient arrive with DNR status?

fields.name: fullcode
fields.description: Was the patient ever full-code?

fields.name: dnr
fields.description: Was the patient ever DNR?

fields.name: dnr_first_charttime
fields.description: At what time was the patient transitioned to DNR?

fields.name: timecmo_chart
fields.description: At what time was the patient transitioned to CMO?

fields.name: cmo_first
fields.description: Were comfort measures under order at the beginning of the stay?

fields.name: cmo_last
fields.description: Were comfort measures under order at the end of the stay?

fields.name: cmo
fields.description: Were comfort measures ever under order during the stay?

fields.name: deathtime
fields.description: Datetime of subject's death. NaN if subject did not die.

fields.name: intime
fields.description: Datetime of subject's intake into ICU.

fields.name: outtime
fields.description: Datetime of subject's exit from ICU.

fields.name: los_icu
fields.description: Length-of-stay in the ICU in days.

fields.name: admission_type
fields.description: Category of admission: {'ELECTIVE', 'EMERGENCY', 'URGENT'}.

fields.name: first_careunit
fields.description: Category of hospital unit where first admitted: {'CCU', 'CSRU', 'MICU', 'SICU', 'TSICU'}

fields.name: mort_icu
fields.description: Indicates if subject died in ICU. 1 if died, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: mort_hosp
fields.description: Indicates if subject died in hospital. 1 if died, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: hospital_expire_flag
fields.description: TODO ???

fields.name: hospstay_seq
fields.description: TODO ???

fields.name: readmission_30
fields.description: Indicates if the patient will be readmitted to icu within 30 days. 1 if readmitted, 0 otherwise.
